materials: Aluminum Cans; Brown Paper Bags; Cardboard; Catalogs; Drink Boxes; Glass (Blue); Glass (Brown); Glass (Clear); Glass (Green); Magazines; Milk Cartons; Newspapers; Office Paper; Paper (Mixed); Paperboard; Phone books; Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (Color HDPE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #3 (PVC); Plastic #4 (LDPE); Plastic #5 (Polypropylene); Plastic #7; Tin or Steel Cans
notes: Residents must participate in the pay-as-you-throw program to receive recycling collection.

name: Call2Recycle at Town of Northborough
hours: Monday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Wednesday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Thursday: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Tuesday: 8:00 AM - 7:00 PM Friday: 7:00 AM - 12:00 PM
materials: Cell Phones; Ni-Cd Batteries; Li-Ion Batteries; Ni-MH Batteries; Ni-Zn Batteries; Small Sealed Lead Acid Batteries; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: The U.S. EPA estimates that more than 350 million rechargeable batteries are purchased annually in the U.S. Thanks to the environmental commitment of this location, its easy and free to recycle your rechargeable batteries. Look for the recycling box or ask a staff member how you can do your part for the environment.
